attributes.action: Stop the Police Enquiry into The Expenses Leak
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The person who leaked the details of the expenses claimed by MPs has performed a necessary and long overdue service to the public. The speaker is out of touch with public opinion. The enquiry is a waste of hard pressed police resources.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
